param.name: lineMetrics
param.para: The array to fill with line information.

param.name: maxLineCount
param.para: The maximum size of the lineMetrics array.

param.name: actualLineCount
param.para: The actual size of the lineMetrics array that is needed.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: If maxLineCount is not large enough E_NOT_SUFFICIENT_BUFFER, which is equivalent to HRESULT_FROM_WIN32(ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_BUFFER), is returned and actualLineCount is set to the number of lines needed.
